item.title: Deadly border fighting breaks out between Pakistan and Taliban
item.description: Both sides accuse the other of starting the overnight fighting and breaching a fragile ceasefire agreed in October.

item.title: New clashes break out between Pakistan and Taliban
item.description: Both sides accuse the other of starting the overnight fighting and breaching a fragile ceasefire agreed in October.

item.title: US and Ukraine negotiators say 'real progress' toward peace depends on Russia
item.description: After two days of "constructive discussions" covering security arrangements and deterrence, they will meet again on Saturday.

item.title: Strictly stars gear up for Musicals week as final looms
item.description: There are just two weeks left in the contest, and things are heating up on the ballroom floor.

item.title: Lured by lucrative job offers and sent to fight for Russia. Kenyans want their sons back
item.description: Kenyan families whose sons have been duped into fighting for Russia demand they be brought home.

item.title: The Papers: 'Netflix seals $85bn Warner Bros deal' and 'One L of a draw'
item.description: The Fifa World Cup 2026 draw features on several Saturday editions.

item.title: This boy has a magic heart - it's my son's who died 10 years ago
item.description: A woman whose husband and son died after being hit by a car wants more people to talk about donation.

item.title: North American leaders take stage together for the first time
item.description: The World Cup draw marked the first time that Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum has met Trump, and the trio briefly discussed trade.

item.title: What should you do if you dislike your friend's partner?
item.description: Former friends Chrishell Stause and Emma Hernan have argued on and off-camera in the Netflix reality show.

item.title: Am I addicted to my smartwatch?
item.description: Do they do what they say they do, or are they just making us more stressed?

item.title: Shoppers loved the 'fabric queen'. Then, order by order, her story fell apart
item.description: Designer Nerida Hansen admits failing customers who ordered textiles worth thousands of dollars from her businesses.

item.title: Single women risk rape and exploitation in search for better life in Europe
item.description: Esther says she faced sexual violence on her journey to Europe after fleeing abuse in Nigeria.

item.title: 'Life being stressful is not an illness' - GPs on mental health over-diagnosis
item.description: Hundreds of GPs in England tell the BBC they are also worried about a lack of help for patients.

item.title: Failed Sarah Ferguson-backed app received Â£1m taxpayers' money
item.description: The former Duchess was an "ambassador" for vVoosh, founded by her friend Manuel Fernandez.
